name: Regie's Maze II
description:
The sequel to Regie's Maze, featuring more levels, jumpscares, and mechanics.

Controls:

Arrows: Move

Space: Run

Mechanics:

Regie:

Regie will start torwards the center of the maze and slowly make his way torwards you. Regie is always active once he spots you.

Levels: The levels will change once you find the exit.

Note: This game was made using a scratch game as it's base, the game has sense been removed.

Dedicated to Funky, my first lizard. This couldn’t exist without her. Thank you.
